title: [机制]SimpleGamemode——随时切换模式[1.11.x]
author: Mithey
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:22 编辑 
SimpleGamemode

功能This is a plugin that changes your game, you can choose 4 gamemode very easily and avoid placing at all times /gamemode, survival, adventure, creative, spectator. Also, I've added strange sounds to the menu!
这是一个可以方便地切换四种模式的插件(PS:换模式时候声音很鬼畜)截图指令&权限/gm -打开切换模式菜单(gm.gamemode)下载地址原贴度盘
